description: Here's what you might have missed Thursday on CNN
title: Quickly catch up on the day's news
title_page: Quickly catch up on the day's news - CNN
maintext:
(CNN) Here's what you might have missed Thursday on CNN:
-- The Senate is at a stalemate over more coronavirus aid after Republicans and Democrats block competing proposals. Democrats cited in part demands it must include money for hospitals and states.
-- British Prime Minister Boris Johnson's condition "continues to improve" after his third night in intensive care with coronavirus, his official spokesman says.
-- Workers at this Detroit hospital describe drastic conditions in the ER, and one doctor says at least two patients have died in the hallways before help could arrive.
-- He couldn't say goodbye to his dying father. She has a newborn nobody can visit. These are the stories of the pandemic.
-- A CNN producer shares her daily life inside a coronavirus quarantine camp in Hong Kong. Spoiler: It's nothing like what she expected.
-- Former Vice President Joe Biden holds a wide lead over President Donald Trump in the national race for the White House, according to a new CNN poll.
